name: Hakamo-o

evolution.description: Hakamo-o can evolve into Kommo-o at level 16 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 12 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Scaly Pokémon. It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to damage from moves with Bullet, Ball, or Bomb in their name.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.
